text: I think the correct command here is: `hs auth personalaccesskey`
Do you get any errors when you try fetching?

<@U54TVT3C1> any chance you’d be willing to share how you put together that gulp-sass task for modules? i’m building a theme (working off of the boilerplate) that’s going to have a bunch of custom modules, and i want to use sass of course — I have the Absanter repo set up, but do you use a separate gulp task for each module? did you integrate it with an actual theme?
I didn’t integrate with a theme
